page.title: 12HOUSING ON MYDDLE HILL.
page.content:
The community of{Myddle Hill}consists of 4 Bungalows, 7 Houses, 1 Garage, 1 Blacksmiths shop and 1 House, known as the Bungalow, which has stairs on the second floor. The{Bungalows}are known as "Olivet","The Outpost","Rosebank" and "Pen_y_craig."Olivet"was built in 1938,"The Outpost"in 1946_47,"Rosebank in 1968,and "Pen_y_craig in 1969.
The{Houses}are known as "The Smithy" "4 Myddle Hill" "5 Myddle Hill" "Highfields" "Woodview" "Orchard House" and "Tanglewood". "The Smithy" "4 Myddle Hill" and "5 Myddle Hill" were built around 1835."Highfields" and "Woodview" were built in 1964_65. "Orchard House"and "Tanglewood" were built in 1982_83. The house known as "The Bungalow was built in 1957. The Blacksmiths shop was built in the 1800s and is now used as a Garage.
